mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.account_id AS "accountId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wms_supplier_type a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.parent_id = #{parent.id}
AND a.parent_ids LIKE '%'||#{parentIds}||'%' '%'+#{parentIds}+'%' concat('%',#{parentIds},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
${sqlMap.dsf} ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wms_supplier_type( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, account_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wms_supplier_type SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE wms_supplier_type SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
